amendment.description: To provide for studies on the feasibility of establishing a business disruption insurance policy for poultry producers and a catastrophic event insurance policy for poultry producers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2426 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2426 proposed by Senator Coons. (consideration: CR S4274; text: CR S4274) To provide for studies on the feasibility of establishing a business disruption insurance policy for poultry producers and a catastrophic event insurance policy for poultry producers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2426 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2426 proposed by Senator Coons.
